segment.source: Applications Licenses Results Pane
segment.target: Applications Licenses Results Pane

segment.source: Applications Licenses Results Pane
segment.target: Applications Licenses Results Pane

segment.source: Applications Licenses Results Pane
segment.target: Applications Licenses Results Pane

segment.source: The Applications Licenses Results pane in the Application Virtualization Server Management Console displays a list of the available application license groups and application licenses.
segment.target: The Applications Licenses Results pane in the Application Virtualization Server Management Console displays a list of the available application license groups and application licenses.

segment.source: Right-click any application license group to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.
segment.target: Right-click any application license group to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.

segment.source: New Unlimited License
segment.target: New Unlimited License

segment.source: Displays the New Unlimited License Wizard.
segment.target: Displays the New Unlimited License Wizard.

segment.source: This option is available only when the license group has no licenses.
segment.target: This option is available only when the license group has no licenses.

segment.source: This wizard consists of three pages:
segment.target: This wizard consists of three pages:

segment.source: Enter a group name in the Applications License Group Name field and a value (in minutes) in the License Expiration Warning field.
segment.target: Enter a group name in the Applications License Group Name field and a value (in minutes) in the License Expiration Warning field.

segment.source: (You can enter any value from 0–100.) You can also use the up and down arrows to select the number of minutes.
segment.target: (You can enter any value from 0–100.) You can also use the up and down arrows to select the number of minutes.

segment.source: Enter brief descriptive text in the License Description field, and select the Enabled check box.
segment.target: Enter brief descriptive text in the License Description field, and select the Enabled check box.

segment.source: Optionally, you can use the Expiration Date field to specify an expiration date for the license.
segment.target: Optionally, you can use the Expiration Date field to specify an expiration date for the license.

segment.source: You can select the default check box or use the calendar utility to browse to the desired expiration date.
segment.target: You can select the default check box or use the calendar utility to browse to the desired expiration date.

segment.source: Click Finish to add the new license.
segment.target: Click Finish to add the new license.

segment.source: New Concurrent License
segment.target: New Concurrent License

segment.source: Displays the New Concurrent License Wizard.
segment.target: Displays the New Concurrent License Wizard.

segment.source: This option is available only when the license group has no unlimited licenses.
segment.target: This option is available only when the license group has no unlimited licenses.

segment.source: This wizard consists of the following pages and is almost identical to the New Unlimited License Wizard:
segment.target: This wizard consists of the following pages and is almost identical to the New Unlimited License Wizard:

segment.source: Enter a group name in the Applications License Group Name field and a value (in minutes) in the License Expiration Warning field.
segment.target: Enter a group name in the Applications License Group Name field and a value (in minutes) in the License Expiration Warning field.

segment.source: (You can enter any value from 0–100.) You can also use the up and down arrows to select the number of minutes.
segment.target: (You can enter any value from 0–100.) You can also use the up and down arrows to select the number of minutes.

segment.source: Enter brief descriptive text in the License Description field, and enter a value in the Concurrent License Quantity field.
segment.target: Enter brief descriptive text in the License Description field, and enter a value in the Concurrent License Quantity field.

segment.source: You can also use the up and down arrows to specify the number of concurrent licenses.
segment.target: You can also use the up and down arrows to specify the number of concurrent licenses.

segment.source: Select the Enabled check box to enable the license.
segment.target: Select the Enabled check box to enable the license.

segment.source: Optionally, you can use the Expiration Date field to select an expiration date for the license.
segment.target: Optionally, you can use the Expiration Date field to select an expiration date for the license.

segment.source: You can select the check box to use the displayed expiration date, or you can use the calendar utility to browse to the desired expiration date.
segment.target: You can select the check box to use the displayed expiration date, or you can use the calendar utility to browse to the desired expiration date.

segment.source: Click Finish to add the new licenses.
segment.target: Click Finish to add the new licenses.

segment.source: New Named License
segment.target: New Named License

segment.source: Displays the New Named License Wizard.
segment.target: Displays the New Named License Wizard.

segment.source: This option is available only when the license group has no unlimited licenses.
segment.target: This option is available only when the license group has no unlimited licenses.

segment.source: This wizard consists of the following pages:
segment.target: This wizard consists of the following pages:

segment.source: Enter a group name in the Applications License Group Name field and a value (in minutes) in the License Expiration Warning field.
segment.target: Enter a group name in the Applications License Group Name field and a value (in minutes) in the License Expiration Warning field.

segment.source: (You can enter any value from 0–100.) You can also use the up and down arrows to select the number of minutes.
segment.target: (You can enter any value from 0–100.) You can also use the up and down arrows to select the number of minutes.

segment.source: Enter brief descriptive text in the License Description, and select the Enabled check box.
segment.target: Enter brief descriptive text in the License Description, and select the Enabled check box.

segment.source: Optionally, you can use the Expiration Date field to specify an expiration date for the license.
segment.target: Optionally, you can use the Expiration Date field to specify an expiration date for the license.

segment.source: You can select the check box to use the displayed expiration date, or use the calendar utility to browse to the desired expiration date.
segment.target: You can select the check box to use the displayed expiration date, or use the calendar utility to browse to the desired expiration date.

segment.source: Click Add, Edit, or Remove named users.
segment.target: Click Add, Edit, or Remove named users.

segment.source: Click Finish to add the new license.
segment.target: Click Finish to add the new license.

segment.source: New Window from Here
segment.target: New Window from Here

segment.source: Opens a new management console with the selected node as the root node.
segment.target: Opens a new management console with the selected node as the root node.

segment.source: Delete
segment.target: Delete

segment.source: Deletes the license group from the list.
segment.target: Deletes the license group from the list.

segment.source: Rename
segment.target: Rename

segment.source: Changes the name of the applications license group.
segment.target: Changes the name of the applications license group.

segment.source: Properties
segment.target: Properties

segment.source: Displays the Properties dialog box for the selected application license groups.
segment.target: Displays the Properties dialog box for the selected application license groups.

segment.source: This dialog box has the following tabs:
segment.target: This dialog box has the following tabs:

segment.source: General tab—Displays general information about the license group.
segment.target: General tab—Displays general information about the license group.

segment.source: From this tab, you can change the time value (in minutes) in the License Expiration Warning field.
segment.target: From this tab, you can change the time value (in minutes) in the License Expiration Warning field.

segment.source: You can enter any value from 0–100.
segment.target: You can enter any value from 0–100.

segment.source: Applications tab—Displays the list of applications associated with the license group.
segment.target: Applications tab—Displays the list of applications associated with the license group.

segment.source: Help
segment.target: Help

segment.source: Displays the Application Virtualization Server Management Console help system.
segment.target: Displays the Application Virtualization Server Management Console help system.

segment.source: When the Results pane displays application license groups, right-click anywhere in the Results pane, except on a license group, to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.
segment.target: When the Results pane displays application license groups, right-click anywhere in the Results pane, except on a license group, to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.

segment.source: Refresh
segment.target: Refresh

segment.source: Refreshes the view of the server.
segment.target: Refreshes the view of the server.

segment.source: Export List
segment.target: Export List

segment.source: Creates a tab-delimited text file that contains the contents of the Results pane.
segment.target: Creates a tab-delimited text file that contains the contents of the Results pane.

segment.source: This item displays a standard File Save dialog box where you specify the location for the text file you are creating.
segment.target: This item displays a standard File Save dialog box where you specify the location for the text file you are creating.

segment.source: View
segment.target: View

segment.source: Changes the appearance and content of the Results pane.
segment.target: Changes the appearance and content of the Results pane.

segment.source: Arrange/Line Up Icons
segment.target: Arrange/Line Up Icons

segment.source: Changes how the icons are displayed in the Results pane.
segment.target: Changes how the icons are displayed in the Results pane.

segment.source: Help
segment.target: Help

segment.source: Displays the help system for the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.
segment.target: Displays the help system for the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.

segment.source: When the Results pane displays licenses, right-click any application license to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.
segment.target: When the Results pane displays licenses, right-click any application license to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.

segment.source: Delete
segment.target: Delete

segment.source: Deletes the license from the list.
segment.target: Deletes the license from the list.

segment.source: Rename
segment.target: Rename

segment.source: Changes the name of the license.
segment.target: Changes the name of the license.

segment.source: Properties
segment.target: Properties

segment.source: Displays the Properties dialog box for the selected application license.
segment.target: Displays the Properties dialog box for the selected application license.

segment.source: The General tab of the Properties dialog box displays information about the license and lets you change the enabled status, license expiration date, and license key information.
segment.target: The General tab of the Properties dialog box displays information about the license and lets you change the enabled status, license expiration date, and license key information.

segment.target: Help

segment.target: Displays the server management console help system.

segment.target: When the Results pane displays licenses, right-click anywhere in the Results pane, except on a license, to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.
